"Why, greetings, Inoue-san, how are you this evening?" Mayuri asked. The woman in question jumped a little bit, interrupted from her lovely meal.

"O-oh.." Orihime swallowed, "Hi, Kurotsuchi-san. I'm fine, thanks how are you?"

"Oh, as well as I could b-- WHAT IN THE NAME OF SCIENCE IS THAT!?" While Orihime whipped around, wide-eyed, he slipped the drug into her meal. Orihime confusedly turned back around.

153.title: Tatsuki

choices: Orihime introduces another breakfast and dinner to the schedule...
1532.content:
Tatsuki panted heavily, her belly stuck out in front of her and stuffed to the brim. She had been eating with Orihime, and as usual, Orihime ate enough for a girl 10 times her size. Orihime had managed to down over 15 plates of food, and she was only pleasantly full! Tatsuki's competitive nature had had her matching Orihime plate for plate, but she only finished 8 plates before she was too stuffed to continue. Suddenly, Tatsuki's cell phone rang.

"Hello?" asked Tatsuki.

"Hey Tatsuki, it's Mom! I just wanted to let you know that your dad and I have decided to go on a 3 month world cruise, and we're leaving you behind. We're already gone, and the house is locked. We knew you don't have any keys, but we packed all of your clothes and money in some suit cases and put them on the front stoop. Find some place too stay while we're gone. See you in three months!" *Click*

"Damn mother..." muttered Tatsuki darkly.

"What's the problem?" asked Orihime.

"I need a place to stay for 3 months while my parents are on a cruise..."

"You can stay with me!" Orihime exclaimed excitedly. "I do all of the chores at my place, so you can just sit and watch TV while I do them, and then we can go out to eat for every meal, and gossip, and like, play games and stuff!"

"Sure. Thanks, Orihime."

***

1 Week Later...

"Hrngh..." groaned Tatsuki, as she sat on the massive recliner in Orihime's front room. The days had gone by in a blur. The cycle was the same, every day: Wake up, go out to McDonald's and eat 4 Egg McMuffins and the equivalent of a gallon of orange juice. Return to Orihime's house. Orihime would do chores, while Tatsuki watched TV. Go out to the buffet for 1st lunch. Eat 6 plates of food. Return home. Call some of the other high school girls to gossip with while snacking. Go out to LeRoy's Steak House for main lunch. Eat a 48 oz. steak. Return to Orihime's house. Watch TV for 2 hours while Orihime exercised. Go out for early dinner at a fast food place. Eat a ton. Go shopping, and watch Orihime try on thousands of outfits. Eat main dinner at the all you can eat buffet again and eat until she could barely move. Go home. Watch TV for 2 more hours while Orihime exercised some more. Sleep. Wake up in the middle of the night with Orihime for a gallon of ice cream. Sleep until morning. Repeat.

This cycle was incredibly apparent on Tatsuki's body: While Orihime exercised for 4 hours every day and ate tons to match it, Tatsuki was eating 5 meals a day and a midnight snack while doing minimal exercise. She had gained almost 10 pounds in a single week, turning her toned stomach into a slight stomach, and giving her ass a little jiggle that wasn't there before. And Tatsuki was also much dirtier. She hadn't bathed or changed clothes once all week. She was constantly passing gas, and was much lazier.
